summary: arch/arm64: Fix topology initialization for core scheduling
details:
arch/arm64: Fix topology initialization for core scheduling

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit c78a1b2d0bff678570c8dc9f14035606f5e5257d, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 9edeaea1bc452372718837ed2ba775811baf1ba1. For more details please see the references link.
